Package de.esoco.lib.expression.predicate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBinaryPredicate<L,R>
    An abstract predicate implementation for binary predicates.
    AbstractPredicate<T>
    An abstract base class for predicates.
    BinaryPredicateChain<L,R,V,W>
    A subclass of DualFunctionChain for predicates that also implements the binary predicate interface.
    ClassPredicate<T>
    A predicate that checks the class of target objects.
    ClassPredicate.HasBaseClass<T>
    A class predicate that checks whether target objects have a particular base class by invoking the Class.isAssignableFrom(Class) method on the compare class with the class to be checked as the argument.
    ClassPredicate.HasClass<T>
    A class predicate that checks whether target objects have a particular class by performing an identity comparison.
    Comparison<L,R>
    Base class for predicates that perform a comparison of target values with a certain compare value.
    Comparison.ElementOf<T>
    Checks whether an input value is an element of a certain collection.
    Comparison.EqualTo<T>
    Compares target values for equality with the compare value by means of the method Object.equals(Object).
    Comparison.GreaterOrEqual<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    Checks whether a target value is greater than or equal to the compare value.
    Comparison.GreaterThan<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    Checks whether a target value is greater than the compare value.
    Comparison.LessOrEqual<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    Checks whether a target value is less than or equal to the compare value.
    Comparison.LessThan<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    Checks whether a target value is less than the compare value.
    Comparison.Matching<T>
    Matches input values against a regular expression pattern.
    Comparison.SameAs<T>
    Compares target values for identity with the compare value.
    ElementPredicate<T,V>
    A function predicate subclass that can only be created with element access functions that are implementations of ElementAccessFunction.
    ExceptionMappingBinaryPredicate<L,R>
    A binary predicate base class that allows subclasses to throw arbitrary exceptions from their evaluation.
    ExceptionMappingPredicate<I>
    A predicate base class that allows subclasses to throw arbitrary exceptions from their evaluation.
    FunctionPredicate<T,V>
    A predicate that evaluates the result of applying a function to input objects with another predicate.
    PredicateChain<T,V>
    A subclass of FunctionChain for predicates that also implements the predicate interface.
    PredicateJoin<T>
    Base class for joins of two predicates (like logical combinations).
